description:
A lean, clean Blundstone Boot classic, in rustic, easy-going leather. Designed to reduce impact as your foot strikes the ground, these deceivingly comfortable boots cushion each step and look good while doing it. A subtle squaring of the toe looks a bit more tailored than the original round toe.

  • Weatherproof leather upper
  • Uppers are seamlessly fused to the sole to provide resilient construction
  • SPS reduces skeletal stress by absorbing and dispersing shock
  • Pull loops for extra leverage
  • Thermo-polyurethane sole is highly abrasion-resistant and provides exceptional traction that works for Canadian winters
  • Square toe, medium width
  • These are sold in Australian sizes, which are different than Canadian/American sizes. Refer to the size chart to determine your correct size
name: Blundstone Dress 1308 Boots - Unisex
